defs: to bend one's head as in shame, shyness, etc.
to abscond oneself to avoid debtors, to avoid being punished or to escape from life-threat.

very foolish, impractical, extravagant; senseless.

the quality or condition of being stupid, senseless; foolishness; stupidity.
